INDES.IS.long_name: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri Mühendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
INDES.IS.summary: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, through its subsidiaries, distributes IT products in Turkey. It operates through Information Technology, Telecom, Logistics, and Leasing segments. The company sells PCs, notebooks, servers, peripherals, software, and OEM products; and CPUs, hard disks, mother boards, VGA cards, monitors, laser printers, and backup hardware, as well as optical, server, memory, and security products. It also offers consumables, moveable data storage media, accessories, and papers; and corporate network systems, structural network components, cable products, corporate telephone systems, and network security and ADSL communication solutions, as well as logistics and transportation services. In addition, the company sells spare parts; offers logistics and rental services; and trades in household electronics. It distributes its products through a network of system integrators, value added dealers, and regular dealers, as well as retail channels, including retail chains, regular computer stores, and e-retail. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
